mapper.sql: SELECT crafwork_struct_plm.id id, crafwork_struct_plm.crafwork_name crafworkName, crafwork_struct_plm.mac_type macType, crafwork_struct_plm.is_check isCheck, crafwork_struct_plm.quarters_emp quartersEmp, crafwork_struct_plm.unit unit, crafwork_struct_plm.deleted deleted, crafwork_struct_plm.company_id companyId, crafwork_struct_plm.create_time createTime, crafwork_struct_plm.create_by createBy, crafwork_struct_plm.modify_time modifyTime, crafwork_struct_plm.modify_by modifyBy, task_receive_emp_mes.act_hours actHours
mapper.select:
FROM crafwork_struct_plm , task_receive_emp_mes
ORDER BY crafwork_struct_plm.id desc
